mapper.insert: insert into km_product (category1_code, category2_code, seller, product_name, description, company, price, discount_rate, discounted_price, point, stock, delivery_cost, thumbnail_list, thumbnail_main, thumbnail_detail, detail_cut, status, duty, receipt, business_type, origin, registration_date) values (#{category1Code}, #{category2Code}, #{seller}, #{productName}, #{description}, #{company}, #{price}, #{discountRate}, #{discountedPrice}, #{point}, #{stock}, #{deliveryCost}, #{thumbnailList}, #{thumbnailMain}, #{thumbnailDetail}, #{detailCut}, #{status}, #{duty}, #{receipt}, #{businessType}, #{origin}, NOW());
